name: Polar-AdGenre
description:
Polar-Ad-Genre

Uh-oh you are a penguin and you're stuck in the arctic! You have one thing up your sleeve though! You can switch genres between platformer and topdown (2 sides)! However you can only hinge onto the topdown realm for a limited amount of time. Use your skills to get yourself out of the arctic! 

Instructions:

W-S and space to move while in platformer realm

stamina represents whether you can switch into the topdown realm.

J to switch into the topdown realm.

After your stamina runs out inside of the topdown realm or you click J again get an extra jump. (Useful For Parkour)

W-S-A-D to move in the topdown realm

Credits:

Me i made the game in 2 days because i overscoped for the first day.
